page.title: 09St. Michael's Church
page.content: St.Michael's Church is the old Parish Church.It is now redundant but has been renovated and preserved by local enthusiasts. The church is on a hill about 2 miles away from the present village. The church is about 900 years old. There is a Saxon Cross on the porch of the church. The church is quite small inside,there are 9 rows of pews on each side,the choir pews and the altar.There is a small bell tower holding an ancient bell. There are narrow stained glass windows. The church stands in an old graveyard and a modern graveyard adjoins the site. The church and graveyard are very attractive and well worth a visit.
